同座: (どうざ) - sitting together; the same theater (theatre); involvement; entanglement; implication
同形: (どうけい) - isomorphism; same shape; same type; same pattern
同形同音異義性: (どうけいどうおんいぎせい) - homonymy; homonymity
同心: (どうしん) - concentricity; same mind/unanimity; (subordinate of 与力)  policeman/constable in the Edo period
同志: (どうし) - like-mindedness/(being of the) same mind/shared sentiment; comrade/fellow/kindred soul
同志会: (どうしかい) - association of kindred spirits
同志愛: (どうしあい) - affection among kindred spirits; bonding; fellow feeling
同性婚: (どうせいこん) - same-sex marriage; gay marriage
同性愛者: (どうせいあいしゃ) - (ant: 異性愛者) homosexual (person)
同性愛者解放運動: (どうせいあいしゃかいほううんどう) - gay liberation movement; gay liberation
同性結婚: (どうせいけっこん) - same-sex marriage; gay marriage
同性間結婚: (どうせいかんけっこん) - same-sex marriage; gay marriage
同情: (どうじょう) - sympathy; compassion; sympathize; sympathise; pity; feel for
同情票: (どうじょうひょう) - sympathy vote
同意書: (どういしょ) - letter of consent; letter of intent; agreement document
同感: (どうかん) - agreement; same opinion; same feeling; sympathy; concurrence
同慶: (どうけい) - matter for mutual congratulation
同憂: (どうゆう) - sharing the same concern
同房: (どうぼう) - the same room; sharing a room; sharers of a room
同所: (どうしょ) - the same place; the same address; the said place
同所的種分化: (どうしょてきしゅぶんか) - sympatric speciation
同文: (どうぶん) - same script; same language
同文同種: (どうぶんどうしゅ) - (yoji) same race and same script
同族会: (どうぞくかい) - family council; family company
同族会社: (どうぞくかいしゃ) - family corporation; affiliated concern
同族目的語: (どうぞくもくてきご) - cognate object
同族目的語動詞: (どうぞくもくてきごどうし) - cognate object verb
同族目的語動詞句: (どうぞくもくてきごどうしく) - cognate object verb phrase
同日の談ではない: (どうじつのだんではない) - bearing no comparison with; not to be mentioned in the same breath as
同日の論ではない: (どうじつのろんではない) - (proverb) there is no comparison between the two; it's not a same-day discussion
同日中に: (どうじつちゅうに) - on the same day
同時: (どうじ) - simultaneous(ly); concurrent; same time; synchronous; together
同時代: (どうじだい) - the same age; same period
同時展開: (どうじてんかい) - simultaneous development; spreading at the same time (e.g. two phenomena)
同時選挙: (どうじせんきょ) - double election (e.g. of the lower and higher chambers)
同時録音: (どうじろくおん) - simultaneous or synchronous recording
同曜日: (どうようび) - same day (of the week)
同書: (どうしょ) - the same book; the said book
同期: (どうき) - contemporary/corresponding period/same period/same class; employee who joined the company in the same year as oneself/classmate/one's contemporary; synchronous/synchronization
同期が取れる: (どうきがとれる) - to be synchronized
同期デジタルハイアラキー: (どうきデジタルハイアラキー) - Synchronous Digital Hierarchy; SDH
同期データリンク制御: (どうきデータリンクせいぎょ) - Synchronous Data Link Control; SDLC
同期ビットストリーム: (どうきビットストリーム) - synchronous bit stream
同期信号: (どうきしんごう) - synchronous idle; SYN
同期外れ: (どうきはずれ) - synchronisation loss (in digital communications); synchronization loss
同期点識別子: (どうきてんしきべつし) - syncpoint identifier
同期生: (どうきせい) - classmate/graduates in the same class; {sumo} wrestlers who began their professional careers in the same tournament
同期転送モード: (どうきてんそうモード) - Synchronous Transfer Mode; STM
同村: (どうそん) - same village; that village
同根: (どうこん) - same root; same origin
同格: (どうかく) - the same rank; equality; apposition
同格関係: (どうかくかんけい) - coordinate relation
同案: (どうあん) - same plan/same idea; that plan/that idea
同梱: (どうこん) - including something in a package
同棲: (どうせい) - cohabitation (usu. of a romantically involved couple); living together
同業: (どうぎょう) - same trade; same business

同業組合: (どうぎょうくみあい) - trade association; craft; guild
